title: Perfekte Steder
overview: Perfekte Steder follows Tobias and Rose, who in no way would swipe right in a Tinder app, if they saw each other's profiles, happen randomly on a summer day in Copenhagen. Two strange young people in the middle of each their lives with lots of plans and ideas about the future. The only thing they have in common is that they are both in the same place at the same time. And in a magic moment, a connection will arise between the two that we are allowed to follow for a few months. A crush that changes them both - on good and evil.
